title: Githyanki Crossbow
content:
Githyanki Crossbow Uncommon 2~11 Damage 1d10 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This heavy crossbow is fashioned from a curious, tensile metal that doesn't seem to be native to Faerûn. Heavy Crossbow 18m Two-Handed 8.1 130

Githyanki Crossbow

1d10 +1 Piercing

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

This heavy crossbow is fashioned from a curious, tensile metal that doesn't seem to be native to Faerûn.
